scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run server
scripts.build: mkdir -p $npm_package_config_build_dir && npm run build:scss && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: cp src/static/*.png $npm_package_config_build_dir & cp src/static/*.jpg $npm_package_config_build_dir & cp src/static/*.ico $npm_package_config_build_dir
scripts.build:scss: node-sass src/scss/index.scss | postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 2 version' -o src/static/style.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:assets & npm run watch:dynamic
